title: Tendril Multi-Tenant Chatbot SaaS
description: A strategic analysis and implementation plan for a multi-tenant chatbot SaaS platform targeting SMB market gaps. Features comprehensive market research, competitive analysis, and detailed technical architecture.

caseStudyPreview.problem: SMBs needed affordable, scalable chatbot solutions
caseStudyPreview.solution: Multi-tenant SaaS platform with AI-powered automation
caseStudyPreview.results: Positive growth and strong user engagement

title: Zeus E-Commerce Platform
description: A scalable, mobile-first e-commerce experience built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Stripe integration. Features blazing-fast performance and custom CMS integration.

caseStudyPreview.problem: Slow e-commerce site with poor mobile experience
caseStudyPreview.results: Strong sales growth and reduced cart abandonment

title: Schibelli.dev
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features a blog, case studies, and interactive components showcasing my development skills and projects.

caseStudyPreview.problem: Outdated portfolio lacking modern design and performance
caseStudyPreview.solution: Complete redesign with Next.js and performance optimization
caseStudyPreview.results: Strong engagement increase and improved user experience

title: Intraweb Technologies
description: A comprehensive web development and technology solutions company website. Features modern design, service showcases, and interactive elements highlighting expertise in React, Next.js, and full-stack development.

caseStudyPreview.problem: Outdated company website failing to generate leads
caseStudyPreview.solution: Modern, conversion-optimized website with clear value proposition
